name: Nice Adventure Time Theme (Tumblr)
description:
A basic and clean looking Adventure Time theme, featuring 'Finn & Jake', a custom Tumblr logo, and a 'Lumpy Space Princess' scroll to top button!

Follow me on Tumblr: http://www.carlycats.tumblr.com/
